article: italy 's roman catholic hierarchy , outraged by a court order to remove crucifixes from a school , faced intense embarrassment tuesday after media reports that a cross used by the pope to celebrate the church 's jubilee year had been abandoned in a rome rubbish dump .
abstract: catholic church embarrassed as pope 's jubilee cross discovered in dump
